articles.title: FBI Dispatches Agents to D.C. Streets as Trump Weighs Calling National Guard
articles.description: The Trump administration has assigned FBI agents to combat violent crimes in Washington, D.C., with President Donald Trump claiming crime is out of control, despite data indicating a decline.

articles.title: Five Al Jazeera Journalists Killed in Israeli Airstrike on Gaza
articles.description: An Israeli airstrike in Gaza City resulted in the deaths of five Al Jazeera journalists, including Anas al-Sharif. The IDF alleged al-Sharif was a Hamas operative, while press freedom advocates condemned the attack.

articles.title: Trump Considers Deploying National Guard Troops to DC
articles.description: President Trump is considering deploying National Guard troops to Washington, D.C., claiming a crime emergency despite data showing a decline in violent crime rates.
